snippet: Jerry Sandusky should be sent to prison for life when a judge sentences him Tuesday, according to several of the jurors who convicted the former Penn State assistant coach of molesting several boys.
abstract: Several jurors who convicted former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky of molesting boys over a period of years say he should be sent to prison for life.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Sandusky should be sent to prison for life when a judge sentences him Tuesday, according to several of the jurors who convicted the former Penn State assistant coach of molesting several boys.

headline.seo: Some Sandusky Jurors Favor a Long Sentence
headline.main: Some Sandusky Jurors Favor a Long Sentence
